name: SpeedDemonz
description:
It's going to be a devilishly good time!

SpeedDemonz is a short silly speed dating game. Players design their own butch demon girl and find themselves weaseled into a strange situation by their best friend, which quickly turns into a a night of meeting new people and possibly even finding a special someone.

Each playthrough gives the player the chance to talk with three out of a total of six possible girls so be sure to at least play it twice if you want to meet everyone!

SpeedDemonz was created for the 2018 Yuri Jam!

If you come across any bugs or spelling mistakes reach out to me at Here
